title: Review: Therabody JetBoots Prime Are Affordable, Portable, and Powerful Enough to Convert Compression Boot Skeptics
content:
Therabody's entry-level boots aren't perfect, but would be a welcome addition to any rider's recovery toolkit.

Read the full article at Review: Therabody JetBoots Prime Are Affordable, Portable, and Powerful Enough to Convert Compression Boot Skeptics on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
